text: Racism, bigotry & hate are wrong - in Charlottesville & anywhere else in this country. We should be a better people than that.

This hate is against everything America stands for. We must all stand united against it. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/896366673871110147 QT @nytimes Fights broke out after torch-bearing white nationalists marched on the University of Virginia  http://nyti.ms/2vP7mP0

This is un-American. We must all stand against hatred and bigotry. Our unity is our strength and diversity is our power. https://twitter.com/nytimes/status/896366928247365632 QT @nytimes Several hundred people marched on the university shouting "You will not replace us" and "Jew will not replace us" http://nyti.ms/2uxEhaX

These haters in #Charlotesville are agitators in search of relevance & publicity for a vile cause very few people support 1/2

While this incident is alarming, it is not surprising. Hate crimes and shows of hostility toward minorities have recently been surging.
